metadata.title: RHSA-2008:0815 -- yum-rhn-plugin security update (Moderate)
metadata.description: Updated yum-rhn-plugin packages that fix a security issue are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5. This update has been rated as having moderate security impact by the Red Hat Security Response Team. The yum-rhn-plugin provides support for yum to securely access a Red Hat Network (RHN) server for software updates.

extend_definition.comment: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5
